title: Constitution Gardens: Bookstore
body: Bookstore       Constitution Gardens does not have a bookstore located on site, but visitors will find numerous books, postcards, CDs, DVDs, and educational materials related to the Declaration of Independence and the U.S. Constitution available for sale at the nearby Washington Monument bookstore or at the Thomas Jefferson Memorial bookstore.  The bookstores are operated by Eastern National, a partner of the National Park Service that sells books and other educational materials and operates many other bookstores at national park sites throughout the country. Proceeds from sales support National Mall and Memorial Parks and other National Parks. The Washington Monument bookstore is located at the Washington Monument Lodge along 15th Street and is open from 8:30 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. daily, except December 25th.  The Thomas Jefferson Memorial bookstore is located in the lower level of the memorial and is open from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily, except December 25th.
